 2022-03482022-04-06GAC,  ,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to BRING INTO FORCE, on Behalf of Canada, the Amendments to Annexes A and C to the Stockholm Convention on Persistent Organic Pollutants.
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to BRING INTO FORCE, on behalf of Canada, the AMENDMENTS TO ANNEXES A AND C OF THE STOCKHOLM CONVENTION ON PERSISTENT ORGANIC POLLUTANTS, adopted in 2011 (decision SC-5/3), in 2015 (decisions SC-7/12 and SC-7/14), in 2017 (decisions SC-8/11 and SC-8/12), and in 2019 (decision SC-9/11).
AttachmentsAttachment
